elements.text:
You go to your parents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your father looks a lot less healthy than you remember. Neither one of your parents mentions anything about his health. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I notice my sadness but gently ask my father how he's doing and accept any answer he gives me.
I want to leave and cry, but decide to stay with the family and engage in conversation.
I decide to give him a big hug and smile.
I don't speak to my parents because they didn't tell me he was sick.
I make a funny joke to get my parents laughing.
